_sText:
This map has a more crates and smoke grenades to make it easier for Ts. This map also includes HDR, which I have never used in a single map. Please Download and Rate!

In this map, the Ts now spawn inside of the temple with a load of grenades, while the CTs still spawn on top of the stairs with AWPs. The Ts run to the top of the stairs while throwing the smoke grenades for more stealth to get to the top, and if you find the flashbangs, they can't even see anyone! Once you get to the top, press one of the buttons and it teleports you to the end of the map. The CTs are stuck inside of a box while you have 3 options to kill them. Either with an AK47,M4A1, OR if you have a C4 go to the top of the box (ladder behind it) plant the bomb and watch the glass box explode with the CTs in it!

Here is a little taste of what you will be doing
